label: Improved offensive line
description: Offensive line has improved (personnel, coaching, or continuity). Expect better pockets and rushing efficiency.

label: Offensive lines we are worried about
description: Offensive line with concerns (injuries, turnover, poor grades). Expect more QB pressure and weaker run game.

label: Flag player
description: Plant your flag. You're above market; willing to draft earlier than consensus.

label: Frag player
description: Player with elevated availability risk (injury, suspension, or age). Requires depth and contingency plans.

label: Post-hype sleeper
description: Once hyped but now discounted. Talent and opportunity path remain intact.

label: Film room zeros
description: Tape reveals concerning traits or usage (can't separate, poor vision, processing). Priced accordingly.

label: Acid reflux all stars
description: Players who may produce, but you hate clicking draft. Risk factors: age, usage, volatility.

label: Film room heroes
description: Tape darlings with traits and roles that translate. Willing to draft aggressively.

label: Swing players
description: Wide outcome range; high spike weeks and low floors. Great for best ball formats.

label: Safe players
description: Stable role and volume; high floor with lower variance. Ideal for managed leagues.
